external_references.description: Wiley, B. et al. (2021, December 29). OverWatch Exposes AQUATIC PANDA in Possession of Log4Shell Exploit Tools During Hands-on Intrusion Attempt. Retrieved January 18, 2022.

description: [Aquatic Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0143) has attempted and failed to run Bash commands on a Windows host by passing them to cmd /C.(Citation: CrowdStrike AQUATIC PANDA December 2021)
